description: a(n) = MAX{T(n,k): k=1,2,...,n}, array T as in A049828.
comments: a(n)/n -> 1, while n goes to infinity (for proof see attached link). - _Tiberiu Szocs-Mihai_, Aug 17 2015
links: Tiberiu Szocs-Mihai, Euclidean summation functions, Math Ticks Blog, January 2011.
prog: (PARI) a(nn) = {for (n=1, nn, m = 0; for (k=1, n, a = n; b = k; r = 1; s = 0; while (r, q = a\b; r = a - b*q; s += r; a = b; b = r); m = max(m, s);); print1(m, ", "););} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 18 2015
author: _Clark Kimberling_
